I've posted some photos of this massive naginata in my Yahoo photo album for those interested in seeing it. My album is: Ron STL and the photos are five labeled Naginata Yasutsugu. 

http://tinyurl.com/q4uz2

Still not too exciting of a blade except for its thickness and weight, but kind of neat. 

Ron
